participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: Confident and outgoing, but can be a bit demanding.
participant_1.background: I'm high maintenance. I love listening to Britney Spears. I like to tan in tanning beds. I love spending money. I diet a lot.

participant_2.name: Oliver
participant_2.personality: Easy-going and adventurous, but tends to be shy in social situations.
participant_2.background: I own a yacht and I rent it out when I am not using it. I've been traveling the world for years. I also like to cook but I am not very good at it. I've been trying all types of food everywhere I go.

content.text:
I am little bit shy☺️ 
Tell me about yourself!
Are you bored talking to me? 😭
I have to go 😔 Have a good day! 😋
